page.title: 05BUILDING DEVELOPMENTS
page.content: An ambitious building programme has been permitted by the buoyant local economy and two major capital works are included in this survey area. A new prison is replacing the present victorian structure inconvenienty situated in the centre of St. Peter Port.The new building will house its inmates in more suitable surroundings in the near future. Another major project has been the construction of the new coeducational Grammar School which was completed in February of this year. It is an ambitious design and incorporates excellent sporting and academic facilities for 800 pupils. The school is intended to become a community education centre.
